org.jasig.cas.monitor

Class EhCacheMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.monitor.AbstractNamedMonitor<CacheStatus>
      • org.jasig.cas.monitor.AbstractCacheMonitor
        • org.jasig.cas.monitor.EhCacheMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Monitor<CacheStatus>

    @Component(value="ehcacheMonitor")
public class EhCacheMonitor
extends AbstractCacheMonitor
    Monitors a Cache instance. The accuracy of statistics is governed by the value of Cache.getStatistics().

    NOTE: computation of highly accurate statistics is expensive.

    Since:
    3.5.1
